item.title: elvena add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: elvena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: elvena add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: elvena add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: elvena add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: elvena add a quote by A.A. Milne
elvena add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: elvena add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: elvena add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: elvena add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Sometimes when I'm talking, my words can't keep up with my thoughts. I wonder why we think faster than we speak. Probably so we can think twice." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: elvena add a quote by Shana Abe
item.description: "I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want…a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved." -- Shana Abe

item.title: elvena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: elvena add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You get what anybody gets - you get a lifetime." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: elvena add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "There are so many fragile things, after all. People break so easily, and so do dreams and hearts." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater...The love we have for each other is bigger than these small differences. And that's the key. It's like a big pie chart, and the love in a relationship has to be the biggest piece. Love can make up for a lot." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I am coming to terms with the fact that loving someone requires a leap of faith, and that a soft landing is never guaranteed." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Music is a total constant. That's why we have such a strong visceral connection to it, you know? Because a song can take you back instantly to a moment, or a place, or even a person. No matter what else has changed in your or the world, that one song says the same, just like that moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's all in the view. That's what I mean about forever, too. For any one of us our forever could end in an hour, or a hundred years from now. You never know for sure, so you'd better make every second count." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There comes a time when the world gets quiet and the only thing left is your own heart. So you'd better learn the sound of it. Otherwise you'll never understand what it's saying." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's just that...I just think that some things are meant to be broken. Imperfect. Chaotic. It's the universe's way of providing contrast, you know? There have to be a few holes in the road. It's how life is." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's a lot easier to be lost than found. It's the reason we're always searching and rarely discovered--so many locks not enough keys." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: elvena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's often just enough to be with someone. I don't need to touch them. Not even talk. A feeling passes between you both. You're not alone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: elvena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: elvena add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "It's being here now that's important. There's no past and there's no future. Time is a very misleading thing. All there is ever, is the now. We can gain experience from the past, but we can't relive it; and we can hope for the future, but we don't know if there is one." -- George Harrison

item.title: elvena add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: elvena add a quote by Erich Fromm
item.description: "Love is a decision, it is a judgment, it is a promise. If love were only a feeling, there would be no basis for the promise to love each other forever. A feeling comes and it may go. How can I judge that it will stay forever, when my act does not involve judgment and decision." -- Erich Fromm

item.title: elvena add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "sometimes you don't need a goal in life, you don't need to know the big picture. you just need to know what you're going to do next!" -- Sophie Kinsella
